name: UsenetStreamer
description: UsenetStreamer is a Stremio addon that bridges Prowlarr/NZBHydra, NZBDav, and Stremio for seamless Usenet streaming. Query your favorite indexers, stream directly over WebDAV, and manage everything from a friendly web dashboard. Features include smart search with IMDb/TMDB/TVDB support, NNTP health checks, multi-language preferences, instant stream detection, and built-in Easynews integration.
author: Sanket9225

form_fields.label: Shared Secret
form_fields.hint: Token used to secure admin dashboard and manifest URLs (auto-generated)
